title: Bathtime
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, John Bird, David Atkinson and Peter Madden
brief_description: A humourous claymation where a woman after waking in the morning takes a bath going through her morning cleansing ritual before work. The partner only later wakes up to find the woman missing.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, John Bird, David Atkinson and Peter Madden
